sentences.en: " Virtual reality has the potential to become a microscope of the mind. "
sentences.cn: 《虚拟现实》一书的作者霍华德-莱因戈尔德说, “ 虚拟现实很有可能成为人脑的显微镜, ”

sentences.en: Argentina came to a virtual standstill while the game was being played.
sentences.cn: 阿根廷在比赛进行期间全国上下事实上进入了停顿状态。

sentences.en: constructing virtual worlds
sentences.cn: 构筑虚拟世界

sentences.en: Earlier this year, everything was coming up roses for them. Their "Going Blank Again" album was selling well, and their British tour was a virtual sell-out.
sentences.cn: 今年年初，他们一切都很顺利。专辑《再次一片空白》十分畅销，英国巡演的票也几乎销售一空。

sentences.en: He claimed to be a virtual prisoner in his own home.
sentences.cn: 他说自己在家里简直就像是个囚犯。

sentences.en: His widow became a virtual recluse for the remainder of her life.
sentences.cn: 他的寡妻孤寂地度过了余生。

sentences.en: Is the object real or virtual?
sentences.cn: 此物是实的还是虚的.

sentences.en: It may also come to the point of virtual dormancy.
sentences.cn: 它也可以达到实际上的潜伏状态.

sentences.en: Jaron Lanier coined the term "virtual reality" and pioneered its early development.
sentences.cn: 杰伦·拉尼尔创造了“虚拟现实”这个词，并成为推动其早期发展的先驱人物。

sentences.en: Let the junction of the three fracture lines have a virtual displacement.
sentences.cn: 令三条折断线的相交处有一虚位移.

sentences.en: The company has a virtual monopoly in this area of trade.
sentences.cn: 这家公司实质上已经垄断了这种贸易。

sentences.en: The country was sliding into a state of virtual civil war.
sentences.cn: 这个国家实际上正逐渐进入内战状态。

sentences.en: The magnitude of the external virtual force is irrelevant.
sentences.cn: 外虚力的大小是无关的.

sentences.en: The original ( real or virtual ) photon is re - created.
sentences.cn: 原来的光子 ( 实的或虚的 ) 再度产生.

sentences.en: The unoccupied orbital are called virtual orbitals.
sentences.cn: 未占轨道叫虚轨道.

sentences.en: The website allows you to take a virtual tour of the art gallery.
sentences.cn: 这个网站可让你对美术馆作一番虚拟参观。

sentences.en: These children were in a state of virtual neglect.
sentences.cn: 这些孩子实际上处于无人照管的状态.

sentences.en: This device helps make virtual reality a more usable and accessible technology.
sentences.cn: 这一装置有助于使虚拟现实成为更可用、更便利的技术。

sentences.en: This is a virtual certainty.
sentences.cn: 这是一件已肯定的事.

sentences.en: This reply is a virtual acceptance of our offer.
sentences.cn: 这一回答实质上是接受了我们的建议.

phrases.tran_cn: 虚拟社群；实质上的群体
虚函数；虚拟函数；虛擬函式
虚拟服务器；虚拟伺服器；虚拟主机

trans.tran_cn: 实质上的，事实上的，（计算机）虚拟的
trans.tran_en: made, done, seen etc on the Internet or on a computer, rather than in the real world
